HOSTINGER DEPLOYMENT - UPLOAD ALL FILES IN THIS FOLDER
======================================================

Upload ALL files and folders from this 'dist' folder to your Hostinger public_html directory.

FILES TO UPLOAD:
----------------
✓ index.html (main HTML file)
✓ .htaccess (for routing - IMPORTANT!)
✓ assets/ folder (contains CSS and JavaScript)
✓ images/ folder (contains all images)

UPLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:
--------------------
1. Login to Hostinger hPanel
2. Open File Manager
3. Go to public_html folder
4. Delete existing files (if any)
5. Upload ALL contents from this dist folder
6. Make sure .htaccess file is uploaded (it's hidden, enable "Show hidden files" in File Manager)

IMPORTANT:
----------
- Upload the CONTENTS of this folder, not the folder itself
- All files should be directly in public_html
- .htaccess is required for the website to work properly

After upload, visit your domain and the site should work!
